id: carin-rtpbc-NamingSystem-ncpdp-provider-id

name: CarinRtpbcNamingSystemNcpdpProviderId

status: active

kind: identifier

date: Dec 7, 2019 11:00:00 PM

publisher: CARIN Alliance

contact:

responsible: National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP)

description: The NCPDP Provider Identification number (NCPDP Provider ID), formerly known as the NABP number, was developed to provide pharmacies with a unique, national identifier that would assist pharmacies in their interactions with pharmacy payers and claims processors. The NCPDP Provider ID is a seven-digit numbering system that is assigned to every licensed pharmacy and qualified Non-Pharmacy Dispensing Site (NPDS) in the United States.

jurisdiction: United States of America (Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'United States of America', given as 'United States of America'})

usage: Used in the US to identify pharmacy sites
